introduction.p: We're going to introduce all the coding structure you'll need for the whole semester, right now.

task.title: Working with variables
task.p: Mathematically speaking a variable is a symbolic representation -- sometimes of a numerical quantity, sometimes an algebraic concept, other times simply a symbol. As a programmer, variables are similar: symbolic values to which is assigned some value. Value is assigned in Sage by a single equal sign.

sage.input: text = "Bob is a hooker" print text
